description: Rifaat al-Assad is sentenced to four years in prison for laundering money to build a property empire.
title: Rifaat al-Assad: Syrian President's uncle jailed in France for money laundering
title_page: Rifaat al-Assad: Syrian President's uncle jailed in France for money laundering - BBC News
maintext: Rifaat is known as the "Butcher of Hama" by some Syrians because of his alleged role in the bloody suppression of an anti-government uprising in the city in 1982 but he has denied any responsibility for the massacre. Between 10,000 and 20,000 people are estimated to have died.
